mapper.select: SELECT ci.cart_item_idx AS cartItemIdx, ci.cart_idx AS cartIdx, ci.sku_idx AS skuIdx, ci.sku_value AS skuValue, s.sku_name AS skuName, s.sku_cost AS skuCost, ci.keep_cost AS keepCost, ci.source AS source, CASE WHEN ci.keep_cost IS NULL THEN s.sku_cost ELSE ci.keep_cost END AS finalCost FROM cart_item ci LEFT JOIN sku s ON ci.sku_idx = s.sku_idx WHERE ci.cart_idx IN ( SELECT cart_idx FROM cart WHERE customer_idx = #{customerIdx} )

SELECT ci.cart_item_idx AS cartItemIdx, ci.cart_idx AS cartIdx, ci.sku_value AS skuValue, ci.sku_idx AS skuIdx, s.sku_name AS skuName, s.sku_cost AS skuCost FROM cart_item ci JOIN sku s ON ci.sku_idx = s.sku_idx

SELECT ci.cart_item_idx AS cartItemIdx, ci.cart_idx AS cartIdx, ci.sku_value AS skuValue, ci.sku_idx AS skuIdx, s.sku_name AS skuName, s.sku_cost AS skuCost, ci.keep_cost AS keepCost FROM cart_item ci JOIN sku s ON ci.sku_idx = s.sku_idx WHERE ci.cart_idx = #{cartIdx}
